column2: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn: Episode EX - 100 Years of Solitude

Recap of Mobile Suit Gundam, Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam, Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ and Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack focusing on Newtype and Zeonism ideals told before UC episode 7.

Included as a bonus on a Volume 7 Blu-ray release of the Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn OVA.
['Mobile Suit Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ', "Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack", 'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn']
